pages.text: The Soul of Minecraft provides all the effects of the forces in it's craft and in turn all the talismans in each force.  The crafting recipe requires an $(l:fargostalismans:talisman_base_ultimate)Ultimate Talisman Base$(/l).  The soul is used to craft the $(l:fargostalismans:soul_of_dimensions)Soul of Dimensions$(/l).
